timeline.bodyText: @olegmoz layout is not used, maybe we can remove it and use @ValueSource here
timeline.author: olenagerasimova

replies.bodyText: @olenagerasimova it is not used now, but it should be used later. GetStorageSlice accepts Storage as parameter now, but it should be changed to accept Settings, extract repo name from request path using Settings.layout and then take Storage by repo name. So I started off with wrtiting proper test and will change GetStorageSlice to do all that later
replies.author: olegmoz
